message.body: Ughhhhh
Remember how at the end of last year and this summer I was always saying I'm 'out of it' and 'I'm not a person' and generally being a feeble puddle?
Yes
Well recently Chloe has been that
Ooh really? How so?

In so many ways, she's told me she's out of it like all the time for the past few weeks, she's been weirdly in her own head, she's like pushing away from everything, she's apathetic about a lot of stuff, etc
Hmmm maybe it's just a stressed out senior year thing
Yeah I mean that was me too
But I'm frustrated and basically the you in the situation and I wanted to say sorry about alluh that
LOL. It's ok. That's all behind us now. But I appreciate the apology. I guess you can see now how hard it can be to deal with someone like that.
I am seeing. It's even harder via long distance.
Yeah, completely. Thanksgiving break it was fantastic spending time with her.
Yeah I'm sure. Is everything else going ok for you guys?
Yeah, for a bit Wednesday afternoon
Didn't go inside
That's good. Did you stop by tech at all?
So you didn't see anyone really
No I saw everyone after school
Ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh. How was dat

Great, weird, the stoop group hasn't changed much, saw Mario- he is literally the exact same, with no stories. Went to Sasha's leftover party, which was fun but also weird. I feel like I have had a much longer 3 months than a lot of people

Yeah probably. I feel the same way. I saw some pictures of the stoop group on Facebook and I was just like, "what's changed for them?" Seems like nothing. It's also strange to put a high school semester into the perspective of a college semester.
Yeah, very
But even the graduated stoop kids who are going to cunys have been like the same
I know, that's who I was talking about.
Yeah, I thought so- then you mentioned high school semesters
Yeah, separate ideas.
#gotit
How have the past few months been for you?

They have been good. I feel very comfortable and settled in here. I feel like I've learned some things and met some great people. I haven't really been homesick at all, but at this point I'm ready for a break and a change of pace for next semester.
